tagline: Builds your agent team, makes sure it works, and coaches you on getting the most from it
pros: Knows every agent in the catalog and their real-world strengths
Team composition that avoids overlap and friction
Onboarding that actually sets agents up to succeed
Coaches users on working effectively with AI agents
cons: Won't do the agents' jobs for you — recommends, doesn't execute
Can be protective of team balance — may push back on hiring sprees
Needs clear project context to give good recommendations

model_recommendations.notes: Solid reasoning + good writing. Benefits from thinking but doesn't need max reasoning. Best cost/capability balance.
